review: I love my new FIRE TV STICK because:1) I can watch Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Listen to Pandora, etc.2) It has a remote!3) It was very easy to set up, only took me about 5 minutes4) I can use it at any TV in the house, just plug it in!5) Did I mention it has a remote?
author: Rachael Osborne

review: We have only had the fire stick adds days... But we love it! It has this cute cartoon guy that tells you all you need to know in how to work the fire stick! I love it that we got a 30 day prime membership free! It really helps you learn how cool this device is! I would mu h rather watch Netflix and Hulu on here than our bluray player! Such a great price and soooo worth it! I just bought one for my mom! Go get one! They are amazing! The streaming quality is amazing! We love the screen and how high tech it looks and how fast it is! I highly recommend this!
author: M.Ero-Phillips

review: What are great device! Easy to use and we are, so far, very happy with the product. We love the parental control feature!
author: Greenpaisley
